name: Dust n' Deagles
description:
Final push for dust n' deagles! finalyzed map system and healing! 

**Note** Game pushed into very unstable server ready state it works however very buggy! Think of it as Early Access!

How to play with multiplayer!

  1. You must have steam and the game installed on your computer
  2. Go on your steam desktop application and in the bottom-right corner you will see a "add a game" section press this!
  3. Select "Add a non-steam game" find where you downloaded dust n' deagles and select dust n' deagles .exe file!
  4. The game should now be in your steam library
  5. You do however need friends to play with, as it is the only way to join multiplayer sessions
  6. Launch the game
  7. Choose either host server or join server
  8. If you host your friends can now join your game using the join server button in the menu!
  9. If you choose join server ensure one of your friends on steam is currently hosting a game
  10. Then a small offset box which will be cut-off the screen will pop-up in 3-10 seconds after pressing the join server button
  11. Press that pop-upped button and then you will load into your friends game!
  12. Only the host of the server can start the game!

Known Issues and things to avoid

  • DO NOT leave the game while gameplay is still going on as it will shut down the entire server for ALL players
  • When you load in don't jump off the map it most likely will break the game
  • Ensure to jump out of the airplane as well
  • Reload sounds are heard by everyone no matter distance, 
  • The map is barren! Wait for the plane to travel a little until you see a town this is where some weapon pickups are and where gameplay can be activated! 

Controls

- 1 = Swap to primary gun

- 2 = Swap to secondary weapon

- f = Equip or pickup weapon or ammo on ground

- f = Jump out of plane during that stage

- Spacebar = jump

- WASD = Up/Down/Left/Right

-Left Shift = Sprinting

- R = Reload

-H = Heal! (Only works when you have a weapon equipped) -Unlimited healing as well

-Tab = Open map!
